title: Brendon Gunn from Woy Woy on Central Coast jailed after having sex with 14-year-old girl
text:
A man who repeatedly had sex with a 14-year-old girl after meeting her outside a train station has been jailed.

Brendon Gunn, 22, from Woy Woy on the Central Coast, was sentenced to eight months jail after he was charged with two counts of having sex with a child aged between 14 and 16 years, The Central Coast Express Advocate reported.

The court heard the then 21-year-old met the 14-year-old girl outside Gosford Train Station in October last year, and she had told him she was 20 years old.

Brendon Gunn, 22, from Woy Woy on the Central Coast was sentenced to eight months jail

The court heard the then 21-year-old met the 14-year-old girl outside Gosford Train Station (pictured) in October last year

A week after meeting, the young girl told her mother she was going to get her nails done but instead met up with Gunn and they went to a home in Woy Woy.

The court heard the pair had sex that night with Gunn still under the impression that the girl was 20.

Gunn later received a message from the girl's brother telling him she was actually 14.

'It was made clear to him the complainant was a 14-year-old girl,' Magistrate Peter Barnett said, the publication reported.

After the message, Gunn took to Facebook and posted, 'I'm 21 and I would not be seen with a girl that age'.

But after finding out her real age, Gunn and the girl had intercourse once more on October 18 last year.

Gunn was sentenced to 18 months jail with a non-parole period of eight months and due to time already served will be able to be released on February 14, 2020.
description: The court heard the then 21-year-old met the 14-year-old girl outside Gosford Train Station in October last year, and she had told him she was 20 years old.
authors: Sahar Mourad For Daily Mail Australia
